comments.comment: hora thakkadi desapaluvo nidi. priyan kiyanne honda pudgalayek. thanks ohuta. eth eka novei mata thiyena prasnaya moda minissu hora thakkadi desapaluvo horakam dooshana kudu buisnes me okkoma dana danath election ekakadi kola nil rathu thoppi dagena vahallu vage unge passema yanne ai. nagahanannda vage kelin theerana ganna avankavama rata goda ganna puluvan nirbeetha kenek indi ai kalin hitapu ha danata inna hora thakkadi desapaluvo passema yanne ape minissu. hora thakkadi desapaluvo hora kapu salli valin nagahanannda ta viruddava mada prachara karanne. parana hora thakkadi desapaluvek janadipathi una kiyanne parliament enne parana hora set ekamai. thava avurudu 5k bana bana innada moda minissu hadanne. buddimath venna danvath nathnam idiriyatath janathava gonnunta andavamin me hora thakkadi desapaluvo yahathin vanjabevi. thanks
comments.author: Luxmi Koswattha
